backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing site settings, logos, and navigation links with admin‑restricted update and add‑link functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing Layout.tsx change to hide the header on /admin-panel/* routes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend components, pages, styles, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Main ICP HTML entry loading the full React app with Internet Identity support.
frontend/nonicp.html: Static hosting entry point loading the non‑ICP React bundle.
frontend/public/data/events.v1.json: Static dataset defining upcoming and past events with metadata and timestamps.
frontend/public/data/impact-stories.v1.j: Static dataset of published impact stories with titles, text, and optional images.
frontend/public/data/programs.v1.json: Static dataset of educational programs including categories, objectives, outcomes, and metadata.
frontend/public/data/team.v1.json: Static dataset listing team members with roles, bios, visibility flags, and ordering.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Full application router and global error boundary defining all public, admin, and control panel routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Handles admin panel layout with authentication checks, role validation, navigation menu, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Provides a login/signup modal with email and password validation, animated UI, and placeholder async auth handling.
frontend/src/components/control/ControlL: Admin layout that checks identity and admin access, redirects unauthorized users, and renders navigation and content slots.
frontend/src/components/control/Standalo: Standalone control panel layout that verifies Internet Identity, handles loading and logout, and provides mobile and sidebar navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a customizable footer with logo, about text, links, and social icons using backend settings with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays a dynamic header with navigation, scrolling effects, auth modal triggers, and optional backend-driven links.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, footer, outlet, and error boundaries ensuring safe rendering and fallback UI.
frontend/src/ControlApp.tsx: Standalone router for the control panel version of the app with isolated layout and routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Hook that determines whether the user is authenticated and has admin role by querying the backend through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Collection of admin-focused React Query hooks for fetching and mutating programs and other entities via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRoleManagemen: Provides mutations for registering emails, associating principals, and granting admin roles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching programs, team members, stories, events, and other data using an actor API with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteSettings.ts: Defines React Query hooks to get and mutate site settings, including header, footer, and social links, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables, typography rules, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by creating the React root and wrapping it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/nonicp/App.jsx: Sets up the non-ICP app version with routing, theming, authentication, and query client configuration.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/AuthProvider.js: Implements a localStorage-backed authentication context handling signup, login, logout, and session restoration.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/authStore.js: LocalStorage-based user and session management handling registration, login, session restore, and logout.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/RequireAuth.jsx: A route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login while showing a loader during initialization.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/useAuth.js: Hook that exposes authentication context values and functions.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpFoo: React footer component showing logo, quick links, involvement links, and social icons.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpHea: Responsive header with navigation, scroll-based styling, and auth-aware user menu.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpLay: Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/nonicp/data/staticDataClien: Client-side JSON fetcher with caching for programs, events, team, and stories data.
frontend/src/nonicp/data/submissionsStor: LocalStorage-backed store for saving and retrieving donations and contact submissions.
frontend/src/nonicp/main.jsx: React entry point rendering the App component.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/AboutPage.jsx: About page displaying mission, values, team members, and impact stories with animations.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/ContactPage.js: Contact page with contact info, social links, and a form saved to local storage.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/DonatePage.jsx: Donation page with preset/custom amounts and form submission stored locally.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/EventsPage.jsx: Fetches and filters events by status, displaying them with sorting, loading states, and UI controls.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/GalleryPage.js: Displays a categorized image gallery with filters and scroll-triggered animations using an IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/HomePage.jsx: Renders the homepage with hero sections, feature lists, parallax images, and scroll/mouse-driven animations.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/LoginPage.jsx: Implements a login form with validation, error handling, and redirect logic using an authentication hook.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/NotFoundPage.j: Shows a styled 404 page with messaging and a button linking back to the homepage.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/ProgramsPage.j: Loads and displays educational programs with category filtering, tabs UI, and scroll-triggered animations.
Renders a protected user-only page showing profile info, logout option, and authentication feature list.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/SignupPage.jsx: Implements a signup form with validation, error handling, and redirects after successful account creation.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the organization's mission, values, impact stories, and team members with animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContacts.t: Admin panel for viewing, marking, and deleting contact form submissions with counts, tables, and confirmation dialogs.
Admin dashboard showing aggregated system stats, contact message counts, and a form to grant admin rights by email and principal.
Displays donation statistics and a table of all donations with amounts, messages, and dates.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEvents.tsx: Admin interface for listing, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting events with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminImpactStor: Manages impact stories including listing, adding, editing, deleting, and toggling publication status with optional images.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Handles admin authentication via Internet Identity and email association for admin access authorization.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPrograms.t: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting programs with form handling and image upload.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTeam.tsx: Admin interface to manage team members, including add, edit, delete, ordering, visibility, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact info, social links, and a validated contact form submitted through a query hook.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlDashbo: Dashboard displaying counts of programs, events, gallery items, team members, and impact stats fetched from admin queries.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlEvents: Control panel for managing events with search, filters, add/edit dialogs, deletion, and optional image upload.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlGaller: Admin page for managing gallery items, supporting search, add/edit, delete, and image uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlImpact: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting impact stories with optional image upload.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlProgra: Admin interface to add, edit, search, and remove programs, including category fields, objectives, outcomes, and image upload.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlSiteSe: Page for editing site-wide settings including header/footer links, social links, slogans, and newsletter text.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlTeam.t: Admin page for managing team members with fields for name, role, bio, visibility, order, and optional photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/control/StandaloneCon: Dashboard displaying summary statistics for programs, events, team, and impact stories with a styled header and status badge.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Offers preset and custom donation options, validates inputs, and submits donations with animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays events fetched from the API with filtering (all, upcoming, past) and sorted listings, along with animated hero and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows gallery items with dynamic category filtering, scroll-triggered animations, and image modal previews.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero sections, feature highlights, stats, and parallax-animated images triggered on scroll.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays programs with category tabs, scroll animations, and skeleton loaders for loading states.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Utility functions to normalize authorization-related error messages and detect auth errors based on message content.
frontend/STATIC_HOSTING.md: Guide explaining ICP vs static hosting modes and how each entry point loads the appropriate React app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom content paths, extensive color/theme extensions, custom shadows, and animations. Imports typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's state, listing existing and new feature requests for logo replacement and conditional header visibility. Includes metadata like schema version and project details.
